verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) <S%H7378>Contend,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> with those who <S%H3401>contend<s%> with me; <S%H3898>Fight<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> those who <S%H3898>fight<s%> against me.
<S%H2388>Take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H6793>shield,<s%> And <S%H6965>rise<s%> up for my <S%H5833>help.<s%>
<S%H9553>Draw<s%> also the <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the battle-axe to <S%H7122>meet<s%> those who <S%H7291>pursue<s%> me; <S%H559>Say<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> "I am your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>"

Let those be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>dishonored<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life;<s%> Let those be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and <S%H3637>humiliated<s%> who <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> against me.
Let them be like <S%H4671>chaff<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> With the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1760>driving<s%> [them] on.
Let their <S%H1870>way<s%> be <S%H2822>dark<s%> and <S%H2519>slippery,<s%> With the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> them.

For <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%> they <S%H2934>hid<s%> their <S%H7568>net<s%> for me; <S%H2600>Without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%> they <S%H2658>dug<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Let <S%H9585>destruction<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon him <S%H3808>unawares<s%><S%H3045>;<s%> And let the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H3920>catch<s%> himself; Into that very <S%H9585>destruction<s%> let him <S%H5307>fall.<s%>
And my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> It shall <S%H7797>exult<s%> in His <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>"Lord,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee, Who <S%H5337>delivers<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> from him <S%H2389>who<s%> is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> for him, And the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from him who <S%H1497>robs<s%> him?"
<S%H2555>Malicious<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up; They <S%H7592>ask<s%> me of things that I do not <S%H3045>know.<s%>
They <S%H9608>repay<s%> me <S%H9567>evil<s%> for <S%H9186>good,<s%> [To] the <S%H7908>bereavement<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But as for me, when they were <S%H2470>sick,<s%> my <S%H3830>clothing<s%> was <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> I <S%H6031>humbled<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting;<s%> And my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> kept <S%H7725>returning<s%> to my <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

I <S%H1980>went<s%> about as though it were my <S%H7453>friend<s%> or <S%H251>brother;<s%> I <S%H7817>bowed<s%> <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H6937>mourning,<s%> as <S%H57>one<s%> <S%H57>who<s%> <S%H57>sorrows<s%> for a <S%H517>mother.<s%>

But at my <S%H6761>stumbling<s%> they <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> themselves together; The <S%H5222>smiters<s%> whom I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> me, They <S%H7167>slandered<s%> me <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1826>ceasing.<s%>
Like <S%H2611>godless<s%> <S%H3934>jesters<s%> at a <S%H4580>feast,<s%> They <S%H2786>gnashed<s%> at me with their <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>

<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H4100>long<s%> wilt Thou <S%H7200>look<s%> on? <S%H7725>Rescue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from their <S%H7722>ravages,<s%> My <S%H3173>only<s%> [life] from the <S%H3715>lions.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>give<s%> Thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation;<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> Thee among a <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H5971>throng.<s%>

Do not let those who are <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me; Neither let those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%> <S%H7169>wink<s%> <S%H7169>maliciously.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>

For they do not <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> But they <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> those <S%H7282>who<s%> are <S%H7282>quiet<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And they <S%H7337>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7337>wide<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1889>"Aha,<s%> <S%H1889>aha,<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> it!"
Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> it, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not <S%H2790>keep<s%> <S%H2790>silent;<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> do not be <S%H7368>far<s%> from me.
<S%H5782>Stir<s%> up Thyself, and <S%H9516>awake<s%> to my <S%H4941>right,<s%> And to my <S%H7379>cause,<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> and my <S%H136>Lord.<s%>
<S%H8199>Judge<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> according to Thy <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> And do not let them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me.
Do not let them <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H1889>"Aha,<s%> our <S%H5315>desire!<s%>" Do not let them <S%H559>say,<s%> "We have <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> him up!"

Let those be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>humiliated<s%> <S%H9191>altogether<s%> who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> at my <S%H9567>distress;<s%> Let those be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> who <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves <S%H5921>over<s%> me.

Let them <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> <S%H2655>who<s%> <S%H2655>favor<s%> my <S%H6664>vindication;<s%> And let them <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified,<s%> <S%H2655>Who<s%> <S%H2655>delights<s%> in the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of His <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
And my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H1897>declare<s%> Thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> [And] Thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
